name: Animal Squad (AyrtonDc)
description:
SPANISH:

Este Juego Fue Creado para el: 5to Reto GameDev:
https://itch.io/jam/5-reto-gamedev

Juego de Tanques de Animales que se disparan por turnos hasta conseguir la victoria y reclamar el Pastel en una isla Paradisiaca...

Simple Mente debes Moverte y Disparar o Cubrirte Cuando sea Tu Turno para conseguir la victoria...

Espero que les guste.

Debido a que mi pc no tiene los recursos necesarios para poder realizar un juego con mayor calidad este es el trabajo que eh podido realizar.

ENGLISH:

This Game Was Created for: 5th GameDev Challenge:

https://itch.io/jam/5-reto-gamedev

Game of Animal Tanks that are shot in turns until they achieve victory and claim the Cake on a Paradise island...

Simple Mind you must Move and Shoot or Take Cover When it is Your Turn to achieve victory...

Hope you like.

Because my pc does not have the necessary resources to be able to make a game with higher quality, this is the work that I have been able to do:

//==============| MY CPU |============//

CPU: i5 3330

RAM: 8gb

Graphic Card: Dont Have

Intel Hd Graphics

Made With:

Unity - Audacity - Blender
